meanings.definition: To set to a starting value or condition.
meanings.sent1: She initialized the game by pressing the start button.
meanings.sent2: The computer program needs to be initialized before it can run.
meanings.sent3: The chef initialized the ingredients for the recipe, making sure everything was ready.
meanings.sent4: The teacher initialized the students' minds with an engaging question.
meanings.sent5: He initialized the conversation with a friendly greeting, setting a positive tone.

meanings.sent1: Before the race, the athletes initialized their equipment to ensure everything was working properly.
meanings.sent2: The technician initialized the system before running the diagnostic tests.
meanings.sent3: The team initialized their strategy, ready to tackle the upcoming challenge.
meanings.sent4: She initialized her plan, making sure every detail was in place.
meanings.sent5: The pilot initialized the pre-flight checklist, ensuring a safe takeoff.
